chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc A
P2: state -> proc A -> Prop
P1: state -> proc A -> Prop

Goal:
(forall (s : state) (p : proc A), s \In coherent -> P1 s p -> P2 s p) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2

Premises:
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Notation coherent := (Coh W)
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
alw_imp' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
alw_envs : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_step : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
alw_unfin : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
alw_ret : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
schedule_ind : forall P : schedule -> Prop, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
alw_envsq : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p1 P -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
alw_act : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
And3 : forall P1 P2 P3 : Prop, P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> [/\ P1, P2 & P3]
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
alw_unfin' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always_sc s1 Unfinished scs P
rely_refl : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s : state), s \In Coh w -> network_rely w this s s
And5 : forall P1 P2 P3 P4 P5 : Prop, P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P5 -> [/\ P1, P2, P3, P4 & P5]
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
And6 : forall P1 P2 P3 P4 P5 P6 : Prop, P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P5 -> P6 -> [/\ P1, P2, P3, P4, P5 & P6]
alw_ret' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop

```coq
intros H.
apply alw_imp'.
* exact H.
* apply alw_refl.
Qed.
```

original: intros H. apply alw_imp'. * apply H. * apply alw_refl.
